parts: A Green Economy prioritizes environmental sustainability through renewable energy, conservation, and eco-friendly practices [2]. It falls under the sustainability-focused economies within the Refracted Economies Framework, aiming to enable human prosperity without environmental degradation [5]. For example, solar power industries are part of the green economy [2].
